content.p: The University Tax Services team deals with VAT, Import VAT and Duty charges, Corporation Tax and tax charges on Expenses and Benefits. Unless regarding a P11D, PSA charge or tax on expense claim. Any enquiries relating to employee personal tax should be addressed to the Payroll Services Team. Payroll and Pensions Services payroll@nottingham.ac.uk X15294 * The University of Nottingham has an Exempt Charity number as it is exempt from registering with the Charities Commission. This term has no other meaning and does not mean that we are exempt from all Corporation Tax Tax Services workspace (staff log-in required) Tax Services Financial Operations Kings Meadow Campus Lenton Lane Nottingham NG7 2NR tel: (0115) 951 5630 (0115) 748 4952 email: tax@nottingham.ac.uk email list: Please see our contacts page
